name: Craft 3
description: A sample app + starterkit for deploying Craft 4 to Heroku.

CRAFT_ENVIRONMENT.description: The Craft environment for this app.

CRAFT_LICENSE_KEY.description: The contents of your Craft license key file. Preserve newlines!

CRAFT_SECURITY_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

CRAFT_STORAGE_PATH.description: Where we should store Craft runtime artifacts. Must be writable by the Heroku web process, and assumed ephemeral. This is not a place to permanently store uploaded files.

CRAFT_EPHEMERAL.description: This value tells Craft to treat the filesystem as ephemeral. It also redirects logs to stdout/stderr.

CRAFT_ALLOW_ADMIN_CHANGES.description: Changes to system configuration should only happen in local development.
